tourName: Thailand for Food Lovers: Complete Gastronomic Itinerary
placesVisited: Chiang Mai, Chiang Rai, Bangkok, Hua Hin, Phuket, Krabi, Koh Lanta
generalInfo: Thai food is celebrated worldwide and for good reasons. Years of tradition and meticulous attention to invigorating all flavor profiles have culminated into a sensory cuisine that is unlike any other. Using a range of aromatic spices and locally-sourced ingredients, Thai chefs create beloved dishes for both traditional tastes and finer palates. On this immersive, 21-day tour of Thailand, you will travel to pivotal destinations that bring timeless recipes to life in perfect fashion. From authentic ethnic hill tribe meals to opulent recreations of classic meals at award-winning restaurants, you will experience much of the best of Thailand’s gastronomic scene.

dayInfo.title: Chiang Mai – A Blend of Tradition and Sophistication
dayInfo.description: Nestled beneath the striking Doi Suthep Mountain lies the thriving city of Chiang Mai. It is often referred to as the Northern capital of Thailand as it holds significant importance to the Thai people. The city is a booming metropolitan paradise that is set amongst a sprawling and unspoiled landscape. The destination is steeped in rich history, and you will explore this heritage through enchanting experiences during your stay. Beyond the alluring sights that await, Chiang Mai boasts the most authentic Northern Thai cuisine. The country’s food culture is no better expressed than on the plate of a traditional Chiang Mai Gaeng Hang Lay , which is a Burmese-inspired, sweet yellow curry. You will dabble in the delectable, northern flavors shortly after you have arrived and checked-in to your exceptional 5-star resort beneath Doi Suthep Mountain. You will witness surreal vistas of the surrounding scenery from the splendor of your private suite. Afterward, you can visit distinguished, local markets for wholesome Thai food experiences. The stalls spread spirited energy throughout the vibrant markets, and locals swarm the busy vendors as they fry timeless dishes in their works. You will become pleasantly lost in the exuberant bustle as you move from stall to stall and tuck into delightful delicacies along the way. Though native chefs are revered for their traditional creations, Chiang Mai boasts a selection of prestigious restaurants for a modern twist on the classics. You can venture out on a guided food tour to the foremost restaurants in the city, where you will dine alongside the upper-class and enjoy award-winning dishes that are paired with elegant glasses of wine. You will depart Chiang Mai feeling inspired by the unique blend of tradition and sophistication that prevails in this sought-after, culinary-centered city.

dayInfo.title: Chiang Rai – Feast Like a Local
dayInfo.description: Neighboring the flourishing city of Chiang Mai is the less-frequented Chiang Rai. Popular among travelers who are searching for an even more authentic experience, this humble destination is a food-lovers paradise. Here, you will stay at a premier, boutique resort that takes its design inspiration from the areas of Burmese-Siamese heritage. With world-class amenities and sumptuous breakfasts to kick off each day, you will bask in complete luxury among the pristine countryside of Northern Thailand. The city limits are bordered by magnificent and luscious hills where native ethnic tribes still reside in rural bliss. You will have the opportunity, accompanied by a knowledgeable guide and translator, to spend the day with one of these friendly communities. As you connect with the local lifestyle and encounter deep-rooted traditions, you will feel overwhelmed with enthusiasm for the simplicity of this way of life. The tribes cherish communal gatherings, and you will delight in a family-style Lanna meal, or Northern Thai meal, with them. Everyone plays their part and works on the spread for lunch, giving you a behind-the-scenes look into what brings their beloved dishes to life. You will share in the stunning spicy flavors of traditional Northern Thai Curry and tuck into marvelous steamed rice meals. Your hosts will ensure that your palates are catered to, and their time-tested recipes are sure to awaken your senses. Your immersive exploration of Chiang Rai’s culinary scene will continue with stylish restaurants that add an innovative flair to their dishes. An elegantly prepared plate of Gai ban tom sab , which is a soybean sauce boiled chicken dish, and Pad mee Yunnan , which is a mix of stir-fried egg noodles with vegetables and meat, should not be missed.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – Thailand’s Celebrated Culinary Scene
dayInfo.description: A quintessential stop on any gastronomic tour of Thailand is Bangkok. The exuberant capital boasts some of the country’s most exceptional cuisine. From street-side stalls that sell exquisite and traditional delicacies to luxurious restaurants that cater to the finer Thai palate, you will be spoiled for choice as you meander through the many meals that Bangkok has to offer. Each evening, you will retreat to your premier, 5-star hotel that rests on the banks of the Chao Phraya River. Your room will share panoramic views of the skyscraper-dominated skyline and an immense stretch of the calm river below. You will feel worlds away in this luxury-minded city, which enthusiastically retains its ancient influence. You will venture out on a walking tour of Bangkok and witness the immaculate temples for which the city is recognized. These iconic and sacred complexes are home to grand Buddhist displays, and there is a wealth to learn about the age-old traditions from your private guide. The tour will be lead through colorful markets, where the scent of Pad Thai , which is a famous noodle dish, sweeps in all directions. You can peruse the many marvelous vendors and tuck into exceptional snacks throughout your tour. You should be on the lookout or ask your tour guide to spot, Chicken Satay , which is a peanut-sauce-covered, chicken snack that is all the rage in Southeast Asia. Before bidding your farewells to Bangkok, it is essential that you experience the finest eating establishments in the city. You will set off in search of the most magnificent meals at celebrated and award-winning restaurants. You will tuck into revered food, sip on prestigious glasses of wine, and witness surreal views from delectable restaurants on a luxurious food tour of the city. Furthermore, you will have the life-changing opportunity to meet the coveted chefs behind the world-famous meals, sharing in stories and culinary secrets that will have you truly cherishing these delightful encounters.

dayInfo.title: Hua Hin – Fresh Seafood with Sunset Views
dayInfo.description: Hua Hin is a seaside district that is located a few hours south of Bangkok. As a result, it is a tremendously popular travel destination among Bangkok locals. Originally, it was designed as a luxurious getaway destination and has since become one of the most sought-after tropical locations along the Thai coast. The love of great food has followed, and among the 5-star resorts, you will find a collection of some of the finest seafood restaurants in Thailand. You will arrive on the sunny shores of Hua Hin and check-in to your immaculate, 5-star resort. The grandeur of your private suite offers uninterrupted vistas of the white-sand beaches. Your accommodation also boasts an impressive assortment of first-class amenities to keep you thoroughly entertained when you return from your gastronomic expeditions. You will start your memorable stay with a sumptuous seafood meal at the resort’s renowned restaurant. Freshly caught fish will be prepared by a team of professionally trained chefs, and you will unwind in complete style from the restaurant’s sweeping balcony. Afterward, you can delight in the splendid Thai sun on the shores of the premier beach and take a dip in the warm crystal-clear waters of the Gulf of Thailand. In the evening, you will enjoy a remarkable sunset over the sea from a pinnacle rooftop bar and restaurant. The remainder of your stay will leave nothing to be desired, and you can find yourselves soaking up your leisure at a leading wellness center. With an array of traditionally-inspired treatments to choose from, you will enliven your minds and bodies like never before. The expert staff will ensure that you are completely comfortable as you inhale the aromatic wafts of essential oils and feel the tension slip away with each spa remedy. You will delve into the delightful seafood of Hua Hin at more of its classy establishments after your spa treatment. Then, you can indulge in King Size Prawns, enjoy delicious oysters, and dine on extravagant Crab Curries at these recognized restaurants.

dayInfo.title: Phuket – Treasured Meals in the Tropics
dayInfo.description: Phuket, Thailand’s largest island, is a treasured, tropical destination that is known for its tremendous white-sand beaches that stretch across its palm tree-lined coastline. Here, gourmet restaurants serve sumptuous seafood meals and share breathtaking views of the serene seaside. Further inland and beyond the shoreline, you will find compelling landmarks that are waiting to be explored. You will enjoy a completely comfortable stay within your private suite at a prestigious resort that is located on the beach. With a gourmet restaurant situated in the resort, you will have exceptional meals within arm’s reach. During your stay, you will visit pivotal destinations across the luscious landscape, and you will transfer to the sacred Big Buddha and capture images of the entire island. Then, you will visit majestic temples and marvel at their intricate designs. You will also spend time on premier beaches and catch rays of sunshine in the Andaman Sea. Perfectly blending leisure and style, your stay will be world-class. You can peruse the exuberant stalls of one of the island’s beloved markets and taste your way through the exciting, authentic dishes. Then, you will sip on elegant cocktails and fine dining on immaculately prepared Tom Yam , which is a fragrant hot and sour soup with seafood, at leading restaurants all over the island. Your memorable Phuket tour will culminate with a romantic, candlelit sea cruise on board a private boat. You and your partner will cherish fabulous memories together of the meals that have been cooked right in front of you by a revered chef as the sunset radiates over the horizon.

dayInfo.title: Krabi – A Taste of Stylish Seclusion
dayInfo.description: A short, luxury speedboat cruise will transfer you across the Andaman Sea to the immensely popular, mainland destination of Krabi. Along the Krabi coast lie stunning shorelines that are encompassed by rugged limestone cliffs. Opulence exudes from every experience in this luxurious location, and you will enjoy your culinary adventure from a fashionable resort on the beach. You will check-in to your stylish suite and soak up the afternoon sun around the secluded infinity pool. Afterward, you will indulge in a fine dining experience at an award-winning restaurant. With uninterrupted vistas of the surrounding area, you will appreciate the finer moments on this memorable evening in Thailand. The following morning will allow you to escape to the isolated and secret beaches on board a private speedboat. You will find yourselves under the shade of a palm tree on soft sands that are rarely visited before discovering the surreal beauty of the jagged limestone cliffs that tower over the emerald sea. You can also kayak across the gentle water for close encounters with the breathtaking sights. A snorkel out to the colorful coral reefs will reveal the majestic sea life that lives below the surface. Schools of fish will surround you, and luminescent coral will ebb and flow with the waves. You will be able to reminisce on these magical moments as you delight in a private lunch on a hideaway beach. This gourmet BBQ will highlight the country’s delicious meat dishes, and you will return to your resort utterly satisfied. To culminate your stay, you will learn to master a few essential Thai dishes at an exemplified culinary school, where you will uncover the secrets behind the country’s most beloved dishes.

dayInfo.title: Koh Lanta – Opulent Bites within Paradise
dayInfo.description: Koh Lanta is a bit less developed than some of Thailand’s most popular islands; however, it still packs a wealth of luxurious experiences. You will arrive at one of the island’s first-class resorts that truly captures the secluded beauty of Koh Lanta. Among the unspoiled and natural environment of the vast seaside, your private suite shares an intimate getaway that is unlike any other. You can breathe in the fresh air and feel the enchanting embrace of freedom on the island before venturing out to an eco-aware restaurant for a sustainable take on traditional Thai cuisine. The incredibly progressive and beautifully back-dropped restaurant will be the perfect place to celebrate your holiday over a sumptuous meal. Your stay within the tropical hub of Thailand will continue as you transfer to Koh Lanta’s jungle skirted secret beaches. With the help of your private guide, you will board a speedboat and visit insider locations that are rarely visited. You will bask in the intimate seclusion of these hideaway beaches and snorkel the stunning sea that is teeming with life. Koh Lanta’s dining experiences flaunt sophistication, and you will tuck into delectable haute cuisine throughout your stay. Your knowledgeable guide will ensure that you visit the most recognized and celebrated restaurants on the island, and you will return to Krabi and make your way to the airport after seeing, tasting, experience almost all that Thailand has to offer. You will cherish these memories of the gastronomic magic that you experienced in a country that firmly rooted in timeless tradition.
